mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, recommended_distance AS recommendedDistance, estimated_time AS estimatedTime, estimated_calories AS estimatedCalories, average_pace AS averagePace, speed, improvement, created_at AS createdAt, expires_at AS expiresAt, followed FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND expires_at > #{now} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
